V.iii.1.C.5.b
.
Example of Degenerative Arthritis Evaluated Based on X-Ray Evidence Only
Situation
:  The Veteran has x-ray evidence of degenerative arthritis of both knees without
limited or painful motion of any of the affected joints, or
incapacitating episodes.
Coded Conclusion
:
1. SC (PTE INC)
5003
Degenerative arthritis of the knees, x-ray evidence
10% from 12-30-01
Rationale
:  There is no limited or painful motion in either joint, but there is x-ray evidence of arthritis in more than one joint to warrant a 10-percent evaluation under
38 CFR 4.71a, DC 5003
.
